means: 宗派主义者，属于宗派的人

sentence.Network_en: He was the fifth person to be killed in sectarian violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是宗派暴力中的第5个罹难者。

sentence.Network_en: The police said the murder was sectarian.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方称这起谋杀是由宗派纷争引起的。

sentence.Network_en: Sectarian politics are ruining the country's economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 派系政治危害着国家的经济.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... rival 竞争者，对手 sectarian 宗派的，宗派主义者 separatist 主张分治（分裂）的人.
...常用广播词汇(政党+政治用语+机构+军事) ...sectarian宗派的，宗派主义者separatist主张分治（分裂）的人
...sect派别，宗派，分裂出来的宗教派别（尤指异端）sectarian宗派主义的；宗派主义者sectarism宗派主义
一句话，属上帝之圣洁的天路客，看起来会像是奇怪的教派（sectarians）。这是因为教会是上帝所拯救来敬拜祂的，是以上帝的心意， …

list.abs: sectarian violence 宗派暴力 shortage of labor/manpower 劳动力不足 North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) 北美自由贸易协定 sectarianism 派别主意 Levels.

just look around and we can see what unending ethnic and sectarian violence is costing our neighbouring countries . should we not value and protect what we have at the moment ?再看看我们的邻国，种族、宗教暴乱难以平息，哀鸿遍野，血雨腥风，令人胆寒，我们又怎能不珍惜和保护现在所拥有的一切？

it is that Iraq is sliding into a sectarian war mainly because its fractious politicians have not been willing to make the concessions needed to achieve national reconciliation .伊拉克正在滑向宗教战争，其主要原因是那些死硬的政客不愿意做出必要让步，以实现国内和解。
(电脑碟片) containing a letter written by a suspected al-Qaida operative, outlining a plan to incite a sectarian war(宗派战争)in Iraq between Shi'ite(.
They must be completely united and must oppose sectarian tendencies ., 两者必须完全团结一致 , 必须反对宗派主义的倾向.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from sectary + -an, reinforced by sect

entry.def: Sectarian means resulting from the differences between different religions.

example.ex: He was the fifth person to be killed in sectarian violence...
example.tran: 他是宗派暴力中的第 5 个罹难者。

example.ex: The police said the murder was sectarian.
example.tran: 警方称这起谋杀是由宗派纷争引起的。

sentences.sentence: "most sectarians are intolerant of the views of any other sect"

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of a sect or sects;
2. belonging to or characteristic of a sect;

sentences.sentence: "the negations of sectarian ideology"- Sidney Hook

auth_sentence.content: It was an approach that also stoked sectarian division.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was an approach that also stoked sectarian division.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was an approach that also stoked sectarian division.

auth_sentence.content: Fighting rages, sectarian hatred is on the rise.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fighting rages, sectarian hatred is on the rise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fighting rages, sectarian hatred is on the rise.

auth_sentence.content: To arm the Sectarian Rabbles...against the orderly Reformed Churches.
auth_sentence.res_content: To arm the Sectarian Rabbles...against the orderly Reformed Churches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To arm the Sectarian Rabbles...against the orderly Reformed Churches.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sect切,割+arian……的,有人的意思→把人群分开的→搞宗派的
section[[n.章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面]]糠?al……的→adj.可组合的
dissect[v.解剖;详细研究]+ion表名词→n.解剖,切开
in进入+sect切,割→昆虫一节一节如被切开

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相交,交叉;道路交叉口,十字路口
stems_affixes.word_buile: intersect[v.横断]+ion表名词→n.相交,交叉;道路交叉口,十字路口

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面
stems_affixes.word_buile: sect切,割+ion表名词→n.章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面
inter在……中间+sect切割 →在中间切→横断
